reportingHoursExplained: This the the complain interval time in hour, after the reporting hours user can submit another report
newsMarque: If both methods 1 and 2 fail, try the 'Information Hub' > 'View All Results' option.
message1: If Method 1 fails, try using Method 2 once.
message1Emplain: This will be shown in the method 1
credit: Share, review policy, report issues, or rate us.

banner.imageURLExplain: Displays Lottie for empty image URL, otherwise shows image. Center crops non-.png images.
banner.actionExplain: Redirects to the provided URL if valid, otherwise displays as a toast. Ignores empty or null actions.

methods.activeMethodExplain: Choose the method to get results. 1: API, 2: Manual, 3 or anything -> Default both will be active (http://results.nu.ac.bd/index_cp.php)

gpaCalculator.subLimitExText: You are currently limited to calculating GPA for a maximum of 32 subjects.

info.is-Show-Info Explain: When isShowInfo is true, the info feature is visible; otherwise, it's hidden.

ads.is-show-ads Explain: When isShowAds is true, the ads feature is visible; otherwise, it's hidden.

settings.LIMIT_EXPLAIN: If limit exceed then ad will not load more than
settings.INTERVAL_EXPLAIN: Interval time to display the next ad
settings.isShowMainExplain: Shows an interstitial ad in MainActivity on resume only when both `isReturningFromAnotherActivity` (in-app) and `isShowMainAcInterstitial` (API) are true.
